articles.title: Woman left behind by cruise ship on Australian island found dead - BBC
articles.description: The Coral Adventurer's crew realised the 80-year-old Australian was missing several hours after they had departed Lizard Island on the Great Barrier Reef.
articles.content:
An 80-year-old Australian woman has been found dead on a Great Barrier Reef island after being left behind by the cruise ship she was travelling on.
The woman had been hiking on Lizard Island, 250km… [+3003 chars]
